mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
rm -rf ./*
curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs/main/Connect/all/tModLoader/install.sh -o install.sh
chmod a+x ./install.sh
./install.sh

variables.name: Language
variables.description:
Defines the language of the server from its language code.
English = en-US, German = de-DE, Italian = it-IT, French = fr-FR, Spanish = es -ES, Russian = ru-RU, Chinese = zh-Hans, Portuguese = pt-BR, Polish = pl-PL

variables.name: Optimization
variables.description: Minimizes liquids moving at the same time. If activated, it can reduce lags, but liquids may take longer to settle.
